Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 5 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled â€œSpirit-Empowered Witnessingâ€. (July 25 - July 31, 2020)

media:group.media:title: â€œChild Impact In Actionâ€œ - 3ABN Today (TDY200031)
media:group.media:description:
In Todayâ€™s program we have Yvonne Shelton interviewing Jim Rennie, CEO, and Josue Gelabert, Donor Relations Manager of Child Impact International. This organization is working really hard to impact the lives of children in India, Bangladesh, Myanmar and other countries. Child Impact is also working with deaf, blind, abandoned children in these areas. Its operation Child Rescue Program rescues trafficked girls from the slums in India. Join us today and learn more about how you can help change the lives of more children.
Learn more at: https://childimpact.org/

entry.title: 7 Keys to Godly Relationships (Sermon) | Jill Morikone

media:group.media:title: 7 Keys to Godly Relationships (Sermon) | Jill Morikone
media:group.media:description:
Sermon produced by 3ABN with Jill Morikone. Are you struggling to have healthy relationships? Perhaps you have not spoken with a loved one or a friend in years? Let learn how the Bible can help you heal and grow your relationships. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Jill Morikone.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
